plot: Advertising Whizz Bob Hutton (Jonathan Coote) is stranded in the middle of nowhere one night. So he can hardly believe his luck when he stumbles upon an inn. But the country pub hides an evil and terrifying secret. The Fiery legend of the Hobgoblin! Can it be true? Or perhaps the sinister landlord Nick (Eric Colvin) and the eccentric Noah (Eamonn Jones) are only having fun with the city slicker? But all hell breaks loose when Bob find a warm welcome in the lustful embrace of the barmaid Lynn (Alice Brown)and burning jealousy unleashes the ancient horror of the Hobgoblin.   Written by  Anonymous

title: Hobgoblin
